mapper.update: update problem set taskBackground = #{taskbackground,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, taskRequirement = #{taskrequirement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, complexity = #{complexity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, resourceType = #{resourcetype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, items = #{items,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, answer = #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subjectType = #{subjecttype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operateTime = #{operatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ID, taskBackground, taskRequirement, complexity, resourceType, items, answer, subjectType, operateTime from problem where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select ID, taskBackground, taskRequirement, complexity, resourceType, items, answer, subjectType, operateTime from problem
